crc.c File Reference

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include "ti/csl/csl_crc.h"

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros.
